products.name: Dublin L
products.description: Dublin L path light provides large-scale pathway illumination with elegant concrete design.
products.full-description: Dublin L is designed for large-scale pathway lighting applications, offering substantial illumination while maintaining the distinctive concrete aesthetic. Perfect for main walkways and architectural accentuation.

products.full-description: Dublin S provides compact pathway lighting with refined concrete aesthetics. Ideal for smaller walkways and intimate outdoor spaces requiring elegant illumination.
